typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Code } as integer,
		Description as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(iifNull(),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(stream1, stream2)
ConditionalSplit1@stream1 sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit1@stream2 sink(input(
		Contract_Category_Code as string,
		Contract_Category_Code_Desc as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
